head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths FEDER, SAMUEL, L., M.D.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths FEDER, SAMUEL, L., M.D.

block.p: FEDER-Samuel, L., M.D. The Mount Sinai Alumni express profound sorrow at the loss of our esteemed colleague and friend. He will be missed. Our deepest condolences are extended to his family. Avi Barbasch, M.D. President Jeffrey S. Freed, M.D., Vice Pres Maria L. Padilla, M.D., Secretary William G. Stein, M.D., Treasurer
